div1.p: Roberts makes inquiries to help Carter locate an assistant who can translate Spanish and Portuguese.

div1.head: Letter from M. A. Roberts to Laura Armistead Carter, [n.d.]
div1.opener:
Library of Congress
Mr. Roberts
Miss Carter
div1.p:
Since you desired some
one to aid during the day
we have made inquiries at the Pan
American Union. They are in hope
of obtaining an assistant who can
handle Spanish and Portuguese
and there are attached herewith
several names

If you were prepared to
utilize one of the Library assistants in the
evening there are several who
would answer (However you expressed
a preference for service during the day). Hence
above suggestions.
